name: CarenodiMW
author: Eloy Lafuente (stronk7)
descriptionmsg: Add the rel=canonical and the meta=refresh tags to pages matching a regexp-based configuration

CarenodiMW_base.description: Base URL to be used for all the canonical and refresh tags

CarenodiMW_canonical_regexp.description: Regular expression to extract the path for the canonical tags

CarenodiMW_refresh_regexp.description: Regular expression to extract the path for the refresh tags

CarenodiMW_refresh_wait.description: Number of seconds to perform the refresh to new URL (0 = immediate)
